messages.message: Ouch... You're stronger than I thought.
Sorry, I'm not good at holding back.
As promised, I will show you the way.
Someone just built a mansion deep in the forest recently. I saw my sisters play around that area last week, they suddenly became weird right after.
They became more aggressive than normal and rampaged around.
Can you help them too? Just give them a good beating until they're exhausted.
Quite a violent method coming from the gentle fairy.
Don't worry, I do that all the time.
